transArray.content: The location of the hotel is superior, just on the main street of Qianmen Avenue, close to various attractions in Qianmen, and close to the subway station. The room equipment and facilities are advanced and considerate, and the humanized design details are meticulous. At the same time, we must also mention the warm service of the little sister and the delicious and fresh freshly made drinks. In short, it is worth recommending!
